auth.forgetPasswordDescription: Enter your email below to reset your password
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.passwordsAndTokenRequired: Email, password, password confirmation, and token are required.
auth.logoutError: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.noDataReceived: No data received from the server.
auth.verifyOtpDescription: Please enter the code sent to your email.
auth.verifyOtpError: Error verifying OTP. Please try again later.
auth.resetPasswordError: An error occurred while resetting the password.
auth.signOutError: An error occurred while signing out.
auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
auth.passwordSpecialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your new password below to reset your password

NotFound.heading: Something's missing
NotFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have necessary permission to view this resource.

404.title: Oops! Page Not Found!
404.description: It seems like the page you're looking for does not exist or might have been removed.

401.title: Unauthorized Access
401.description: Please log in with the appropriate credentials to access this resource.

500.title: Oops! Something went wrong
500.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

503.title: Website is under maintenance!
503.description: The site is not available at the moment. We'll be back online shortly.

Public.Name: Name
Public.image_mimes: Only jpeg, png, jpg, or gif files are allowed.
Public.image_max_size: The image must be smaller than 2 MB.
Public.UnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Public.code_max: Color code must not exceed 20 characters.
